thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-China United Travel to invest 49 mln yuan to jointly set up cold chain logistics JV with partner

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China United Travel to invest 49 mln yuan to jointly set up cold chain logistics JV with partner

organizations.name: reuters) - china united travel co ltd

text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - China United Travel Co Ltd :
* Says it plans to jointly set up a cold chain logistics JV with partner
* The JV will be capitalized at 100 million yuan and the company will hold a 49 percent stake with investment of 49 million yuan in the JV
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/JrWcMj
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
